system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Combat Swords)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.ca7rf45gdzJ559fC]{Sword Martial Arts}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.9jA8Ww2D0XBMTPOQ]{Sword Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding a shortsword, bastard sword, broadsword, longsword, great sword, khepesh, or maquahuitl the Critical Threat range is 12-18 and any natural roll of a 15-18 is an automatic hit. Also, when attacking with any of the listed weapons, a character may exchange one die of damage to a die of bludgeoning damage.

Normal

16-18 are automatic hits without this feat
system.summary: 12-18 Crit Range, 15-18 auto hit, pommel strike
